item.title: What does this mean?
item.dc:creator: @daxter852 daxter852
item.description:
@daxter852 wrote:

I’m trying to make an easter event for my 317/delta. I figured this part out…

else if(NPCID == 1835){ NpcDialogue = 130; NpcDialogueSend = false; }
That will bring you to

case 130: talk("The rats are at it again! They stole my easter eggs! Can you bring me back 10?", 1835); break;
I want it to say “Yes and no” as an option after. How do i do this? After the case 130 to make it go to case 131 that’s an option.

Read full topic
